referenceType.description: The type of the reference. For North American providers this would normally be CLLI.

referenceId.description: A reference to an address by id; this would include such things as CLLI Codes, or Seller-assigned address identifiers.

siteName.description: A name by which the site is known.

siteCompanyName.description: The name of the company located at the service site.

endCustomerName.description: The name of the end (retail) customer.

additionalSiteInformation.description: Additional information about the Site or special delivery information.

siteDescription.description: A description for the service site.
